title: Add ETR Everyday subscription membership section

requirements.summary: Create ETRMembership component displaying 'Ethos Towing & Recovery Everyday' (branded as 'ETR Everyday') subscription program
acceptanceCriteria: Component is created at frontend/src/components/ETRMembership.tsx
Section displays both the full name 'Ethos Towing & Recovery Everyday' and the branded name 'ETR Everyday'
Component follows the existing design system with red, white, and blue color palette
Layout is responsive and works on mobile and desktop viewports

file_operations.description: Create a new React component that displays the ETR Everyday membership program. Use the same structural patterns as About.tsx and Services.tsx with a section wrapper, heading with gradient text effect, subheading describing the program, and a grid layout for feature cards. Apply the existing red, white, and blue color palette (--destructive, --primary, --background) and maintain responsive design with mobile-first approach. Include both the full name 'Ethos Towing & Recovery Everyday' and branded display name 'ETR Everyday' in the heading hierarchy. Use lucide-react icons for visual elements and apply gradient hover effects consistent with existing components.

requirements.summary: Display membership price of $110 prominently in ETRMembership component
acceptanceCriteria: Price of $110 is displayed prominently in the membership section
Pricing uses clear, readable typography consistent with the design system
Price presentation conveys value and authority

file_operations.description: Add a prominently styled pricing display showing $110 for the membership. Use large, bold typography with the existing color palette to emphasize the price point. Position the price near the top of the section after the heading and description, using a card or highlighted container to draw attention. Apply consistent spacing and alignment with the rest of the component.

requirements.summary: Update chatbot responses to include ETR Everyday membership information
acceptanceCriteria: Chatbot responses include ETR Everyday membership information when relevant
Responses mention the $110 membership price
Responses reference key benefits like 24/7 roadside assistance, battery service, flat tire service, fuel delivery, lockout services, member discounts, and expert advice
Chatbot can answer questions about membership features and pricing

file_operations.description: Add new response patterns for membership-related queries. Include patterns matching keywords like 'membership', 'subscribe', 'etr everyday', 'member', 'subscription', 'plan', and 'price'. Create responses that mention the $110 ETR Everyday membership, describe the full name 'Ethos Towing & Recovery Everyday', and list the seven key benefits: 24/7 roadside assistance, mobile battery service, flat tire service, emergency fuel delivery, lockout services, member discounts, and expert automotive advice. Add suggestions that help users learn more about membership features or contact the company to sign up.
